segments.advisor_message: So, uh, let’s talk about your job—what do you, um, do for a living? Like, what's your position and, you know, your company?
segments.client_message: Oh, right!  I'm, uh, an engineer, I, well, mainly work with, uh, software stuff, right? I’ve been at GreenTech for, like, I dunno, a couple years now, I guess. In, uh, programming? And honestly, it’s been, uh, pretty good, you know?
